Welcome to Friends Career Center

27 July 2021

Welcome to the Friends Career Center (FCC). As a young person, you are constantly thinking of what is next. For many of us, school is always the next option up until we finish high school. However, after high school you start to ask yourself so many questions. “What is Next?”...
